mapper.insert: insert into t_user_answers (cid, uid, paper_id, c_desc, c_answer) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{cAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select cid, uid, paper_id, c_desc, c_answer from t_user_answers
